text: local health officers regulations on public health amend rsa i to read as follows the health officers of towns may make regulations for the prevention and removal of nuisances and such other regulations relating to the public health as in their judgment the health and safety of the people require such as garbage insects unsanitary living conditions septic rodents and safe drinking water inspections which shall take effect when approved by the selectmen recorded by the town clerk and published in some newspaper printed in the town or when copies thereof have been posted in or more public places in the town
